attributes.action: Open the woodside culb as normal
attributes.additional_details:
Remember when the woodside club was opened every day? Remember the steam and sona bath?

Remember going up on a weekends?

The Pool is still there but the steam room is closed, Sona bath is also closed and worst of all it is hardly ever opened at all.

Don't you think it's about time we got our club back? Accessible across the week for all ages. Woodside is being treated like second class citizens.

This is for the welfare of all the citizens and full utilization of the community resources
attributes.background: We want woodside culb to be opened for all the days. Including weekends. Also open all the available facilities like Sona bath and steam room like old days.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local amenities are a matter for their operators, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise this issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
